title: Need bottom-up, sectoral AI deployment rather than scale: Economic Survey
description: The Economic Survey 2025-26 recognised that India would need to beat emerging hubs such as Malaysia, Japan and Vietnam to set up more data centres given the country currently hosts only 3% of the 11,000 data centres worldwide, even as it generates nearly 20% of global data.

title: Youtube unveils new Aronofsky produced AI series
description: -Imagine living through the American Revolution. Before independence was hardened into myth. Welcome to 1776. Through pivotal figures and moments, this series captures a nation suspended in uncertainty. Witness the Revolution as it was lived. Not inevitable. But imagined, argued, and bled into existence.-New series that Darren Aronofsky is producing via his AI-focused venture Primordial Soup. Made in part with AI from Google DeepMind.-The fact-based narratives will rely on SAG voice actors and AI visualsSourceHow SAG could partake in this when its just "real" voices but no real people on the screen....

title: New AI Tool Accelerates Hearing Research with Unprecedented 3D Views of Sensory Cells
description: Scientists have developed a 3D, AI-based tool for viewing hearing cells. To understand hearing damage from noise and aging, and develop new treatments, scientists need detailed images of hair cells. The new VASCilia tool uses deep learning to accelerate sensory cell image processing and analysis.

title: Microsoft’s $80 Billion AI Gamble Rattles Wall Street as Cloud Growth Slows
description: Microsoft's stock dropped 6% after revealing $80 billion in AI spending plans alongside slowing Azure growth. The tech giant faces investor skepticism about when massive AI infrastructure investments will generate meaningful returns, highlighting tensions in the industry's AI monetization strategy.

title: Iowa teen recovering after surgeon uses artificial intelligence to rebuild jaw
description: Iowa teen recovering after surgeon uses artificial intelligence to rebuild jaw
